import React,{Component} from 'react' import Select from 'react-select' import countryList from 'react-select-country-list' import SelectCurrency from 'react-select-currency' const cList = countryList().getData() const selectedCurrency = currency => { this.setState({currency}) } export default class FormCheckout extends Component{ state={ username : '', email: '', passowrd: '', confirmPassword: '', selectedCountry: null, currency: '', } handleSubmit=event=>{ event.prevent } handleChange=(e)=>{ this.setState({ [e.target.id]:e.target.value },()=>{ console.log(this.state); }) } selectedCurrency = currency => { this.setState({ currency }); } handleSelectChange = selectedCountry => { this.setState({ selectedCountry }); console.log(`Option selected:`, selectedCountry); }; render(){ const { selectedCountry } = this.state; return (
